charges.charge_description: FRAUD BY WIRE, RADIO, OR TELEVISION - knowingly and willfully did devise and  intend to devise a scheme and artifice to defraud and to obtain money and property from the Bank  Account by means of false and fraudulent pretenses and representations. Subject to forfeiture allegations pursuant to Title 18, United States Code, Sections 981(a)(1)(C) and 982(a)(2), and Title  28, United States Code, Section 2461(c) .(1)
